Verify the tooltip becomes visible with opacity 1, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, x coordinate 10px relative to the icon, y coordinate -30px, text content 'Click for assistance', z-index 999, and transition 'opacity 0.2s ease-in'
Trigger a 'Success' toast notification
Verify the toast notification is visible, positioned fixed at 'bottom: 20px', 'right: 20px', width 300px, background color #4caf50, text color #ffffff, and box shadow '0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)'
Verify the message text 'Item added to cart successfully!' has font size 16px
Verify the close icon (X) is displayed, has cursor 'pointer', and offset width 24px
Display a 'New' product badge on an item card

Verify the badge text content is 'New', background color #ff0000, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 4px 8px, border radius 12px, displays as 'inline-block', positioned relative to parent container at 'top: 10px' and 'left: 10px', and text font weight 700
Open the date picker calendar
Verify the calendar grid displays with 'display: grid', 'grid-template-columns: repeat(7, 1fr)', and gap 5px
Verify the currently selected date cell ('15') has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and border radius 50%
Verify day labels (e.g., 'Mon', 'Tue') have font size 14px and color #777777
Verify the 'Next month' button has aria-label 'Next month' and is clickable
Initiate dragging of a 'Task Item' from a list
Verify the draggable element initially has cursor 'grab', background color #f0f0f0, padding 10px, and border '1px solid #ccc'
Verify that while being dragged, its opacity is 0.7, transform is 'translate(10px, 10px)' from its original position, and box shadow '0px 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)' is applied
Verify the item's text content is 'Complete Feature X'
Verify the drag handle is visible with width 20px and height 20px
View a user's profile page containing an avatar
Verify the avatar image has source 'user_profile.jpg', alt text 'User Profile Picture', width 60px, height 60px, border radius 50%, object-fit 'cover', and border '2px solid #007bff'
Verify an online status overlay circle is visible, has background color green, width 12px, height 12px, and is positioned 'absolute' at 'bottom: 0', 'right: 0' relative to the avatar
Verify the 'Read More' hyperlink text content is 'Read More', default text color #007bff, text decoration 'none', href 'https://example.com/article/1', and is clickable
Verify on hover, the 'Read More' hyperlink text color changes to #0056b3 and text decoration becomes 'underline' with 'color 0.2s ease' transition
Verify on focus, the 'Read More' hyperlink displays an outline of '2px solid #0056b3'
Observe the breadcrumbs navigation on a product page
Verify the breadcrumbs element has 'display: flex', gap 8px, and font size 14px
Verify the 'Home' link text is 'Home' with color #007bff and href '/'
Verify the category link 'Electronics' has text content 'Electronics' and href '/electronics'
Verify the separator character is '>' with color #6c757d
Verify the current page text 'Smartphones' has font weight 600 and color #343a40
Display a code snippet block on a documentation page
Verify the code block has background color #f5f5f5, padding 16px, border radius 4px, 'overflow-x: auto', and width 100%
Verify the preformatted text element uses font-family 'Consolas', 'monospace', line height 1.5, and text color #333333
Verify the code content is exactly 'console.log('Hello, World!');'
Verify the scroll-left position is initially 0px
Load the interactive map widget on the 'Locations' page
Verify the map container has width 600px, height 400px, and background color #e0e0e0
Verify the map canvas is visible and fully loaded within 2 seconds
Verify exactly 2 zoom control buttons are present, each with font size 20px and cursor 'pointer'
Verify 5 marker icons are displayed, each with source 'marker.png', width 32px, and height 32px
Verify the initial map center coordinate is (x: 100, y: 150)
